messages.message: Ah just realized another isolation issue when `context-switching.spec.ts` and `edit-name.spec-ts` run together. The first one tries the assert the community context by finding the user's first/last name, but the second test will update the first and last name. I'm thinking rewriting the context-switching test with unit test instead (or some other way to work around this) so i'm going to mark skip the tests for now.
actually, i'm just going to make these tests use different users
